name: Alex Jacob
title: Audio Engineer Exec
bio: Hey there! I'm Alex, a sixth year PhD student in the department of Psychology. My research is focused on emotional memories and the basic mechanisms that control how they're formed. This is my second year with Raw Talk, and I'm excited to help bring you fascinating science stories! As an audio engineer, my job is to make our guests and hosts sound their best. So if you're ever listening to an interview and feel self conscious because our guests never stumble over their words or say "um" or "like", don't worry! They had a little help ðŸ˜‰
